On May 31, 2023, the Calamari Network chain stopped producing blocks. This was due to the expiration of the parachain lease on Kusama. As a solution, the team is currently in the process of obtaining another parachain‚Ä¶ https://t.co/cbbhgmQLGy

the reason for this sell pressure at this level is due to the fact top G has a sell wall, offloading all his bitcoin he bought at the bottom, selling to pay his legal fees

Due to the absence of a clear official protocol for PRC-20 and the resulting market confusion, we, as consensus builders, founded the POLS DAO to develop a definitive solution. Our aim is to establish a fair market and offer creative insights into the inscription market.#POLS pic.twitter.com/5lPa0trIo2

— POLSDAO (@POLSDAO) November 16, 2023

SturdyFinance was exploited for 442 ETH yesterday. However, this was due to a read-only reentrancy exploit which is a topic that isn't discussed nearly enough.

Here's a simple explanation of how read-only reentrancy exploits work, using yesterday's hack as an example üßµ: pic.twitter.com/6VdbykqR4F

— cygaar (@0xCygaar) June 12, 2023

TeleportDAO's BTC bridge to Polygon was exploited due to improper btc transaction parsing in Solidity. The contract processes Bitcoin transactions by users providing transaction chunks, reassembling them, verifying merkle proof and parsing the amount and recipient teleBTC. https://t.co/8JSuY3phWy

— 3155.eth (@punk3155) November 25, 2023
